casebody.data:
Howard E. LEPPER, Plaintiff in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 22, 1924.) No. 158 In Error to the District Court of the United States for the Western District of New York. William J. Donovan, U. S. Atty., of Buffalo, N. Y. (G. G. Depew, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Buffalo, N. Y., of counsel), for the United States.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment (288 Fed. 136) affirmed in open court.
